titleStmt.title: A catalogue of diuers visible professors of the Catholike faith Which sheweth, that the Roman Church hath byn (as the true Church must be) continually visible, in all ages since Christ. Taken out of the appendix to the Reply of A.D. vnto M. Ant. Wotton, and M. Ioh. White ministers.
Reply made unto Mr. Anthony Wotton and Mr. John White ministers. Selections
titleStmt.author: Fisher, John, 1569-1641.
